thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian demands primary physical custody of kids post Soctt Disick split
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian demands primary physical custody of kids post Soctt Disick split | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Kourtney Kardashian demands primary physical custody of kids post Soctt Disick split
text:
Other Articles Study sheds light on culinary habits of Stonehenge builders 'Fantasy Island' to get reboot with female protagonist Leonardo DiCaprio to make movie on Volkswagen scandal Kourtney Kardashian might have given up on her relationship with Soctt Disick, but she is definitely not giving up on her kids as she is now demanding their primary physical custody.
According to sources, 36-year-old reality star wants her kids Mason Disick, Penelope Disick and Reign Disick to physically live day to day with her, which is also known as primary physical custody, reports E! Online.
The insiders further revealed that no official paperwork has been filed and there is no drama over their casual custody arrangement.
It is being said that it is not a big debate between the estranged duo as the 32-year-old TV personality is travelling right now.
 14, 2015 8:25 pm
